title: NewSpace Capital joins the European Space Agency Investor Network
summary: NewSpace Capital, a global private equity firm, has joined the European Space Agency’s (ESA) Investor Network to support growth-stage space companies. The collaboration aims to strengthen ties between space tech companies and investors, with NewSpace Capital focusing on areas like earth observation, navigation, and satellite communications. ICEYE is mentioned as one of NewSpace Capital’s investees but is not directly involved in the announced deal.
why_it_matters: The partnership highlights ESA’s strategy to expand its investor network and foster growth in the European space ecosystem. While NewSpace Capital’s involvement may indirectly benefit its portfolio companies like ICEYE, the article does not describe a concrete deal involving ICEYE.
